name: Collegium Pharmaceutical, Inc.
description: Collegium Pharmaceutical, Inc. is a specialty pharmaceutical company focused on the development and commercialization of innovative products that treat chronic pain and other medical conditions. Founded in 2008 and headquartered in Stoughton, Massachusetts, Collegium aims to improve the lives of patients by providing effective and safe therapies, primarily through its lead product, Xtampza ER, an abuse-deterrent formulation of oxycodone. The company is committed to addressing the opioid crisis by developing formulations that minimize the risk of misuse while effectively managing pain. Collegium is also engaged in the development of new therapies and formulations that leverage its advanced drug delivery technologies, expanding its product pipeline with additional candidates aimed at treating various pain-related conditions and other therapeutic areas. The company's mission is to provide innovative solutions that enhance patient care and reduce the burden of chronic pain, while also prioritizing safety and efficacy in its product offerings.
